So:

2. Can you download the current version BIRT and try agagin?
3. If the error still happens, can you give me your private oracle DataSource? You can remove the sensitive data before give it to me. I will test it  immediately when I get it.

Thanks.

There is a data item in the table footer, if the table uses a empty result, the report engine still try to create the table header and footer. The data item will fail as there is no result set.

I think this issue has been fixed, please verify it.

please tell me which version birt viewer i should verify this fixed issue on? 
> There is a data item in the table footer, if the table uses a empty result, the
> report engine still try to create the table header and footer. The data item
> will fail as there is no result set.
> I think this issue has been fixed, please verify it.

Hi, damon.

You can try the BIRT of Aug 2006. This bug has been fixed on 24 Jul 2006.

Thanks.
